articles.author: Alexander Cornwell, Parisa Hafezi
articles.description: Israel and Iran launched fresh attacks on each other late on Saturday, stoking fears of a wider conflict after Israel expanded its surprise campaign against its main rival with a strike on the world's biggest gas field.
articles.title: Israel and Iran strike at each other in new wave of attacks

articles.author: John Irish, David Ljunggren
articles.description: Group of Seven leaders gather in the Canadian Rockies starting on Sunday amid growing splits with the United States over foreign policy and trade, with host Canada striving to avoid clashes with President Donald Trump.
articles.title: G7 leaders meet in Canada hoping to avoid Trump clash

articles.author: Steve Holland
articles.description: Two officials said the Israelis reported that they had an opportunity to kill the top Iranian leader, but Trump waved them off of the plan.
articles.title: Trump vetoed Israeli plan to kill Iran's supreme leader, US officials say

articles.author: Guillermo Martinez, Ana Cantero, Giulio Piovaccari
articles.description: "Your holidays, my misery," protesters chanted in Barcelona while holding up banners emblazoned with slogans such as "mass tourism kills the city" and "their greed brings us ruin."
articles.title: Protesters against overtourism take to the streets of southern Europe

articles.author: Humeyra Pamuk
articles.description: U.S. President Donald Trump's administration is considering significantly expanding its travel ban by potentially banning citizens of 36 additional countries from entering the United States, according to an internal State Department cable seen by Reuters.
articles.title: Trump administration weighs adding 36 countries to travel ban, memo says

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: It is the fourth in a series of handovers of soldiers' remains to take place in the past week.
articles.title: Russia has handed Ukraine another 1,200 bodies of war dead, Russian news agencies report

articles.author: Tom Polansek, Nathan Layne
articles.description: Sen. Amy Klobuchar said authorities think the suspect is still in the Midwest.
articles.title: Gunman who shot two Minnesota lawmakers still at large as manhunt continues

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: All seven people on a helicopter in northern India were killed early on Sunday when it crashed while ferrying passengers on a popular Hindu pilgrimage route in the Himalayan state of Uttarakhand, officials said.
articles.title: Helicopter crash in northern India kills 7 on Hindu pilgrimage route

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Estee Lauder said on Sunday that its chairman emeritus, Leonard Lauder, has died at the age of 92.
articles.title: Estee Lauder chairman emeritus Leonard Lauder dies, company says

articles.author: Abhijith Ganapavaram, Aditya Kalra, Sudipto Ganguly
articles.description: Officials from the U.S. National Transportation Safety Board (NTSB) surveyed the site of Air India plane crash that killed at least 271 people, sources said on Sunday, with families continuing to wait for DNA profiling results to identify charred bodies.
articles.title: U.S. officials survey Air India crash site, families continue to wait for bodies
